title: Looking for duo partners (bronze)
body:
Just looking for duo partners, currently in bronze and would like to raise elo. I do want a partner that i can log on every night and duo with hopefully, a good adc would be pref as i like to sup, i can also fill every other role well.  Add me! 

I play as sup: {{champion:53}} {{champion:16}}, and pretty much whatever you prefer, i just like those 2 as solo.
Top:{{champion:74}} {{champion:86}} 
etc etc

replies.body: Does this mean you're breaking up with me :'( I cri errytim

add me
I need good adc to duo-carry with =)
also refer to my other message in this thread for the highest rank I have achieved so far and my current situation

Note: I am currently at work

Will do,

I'm at work too :D - ADULT DUO FTW!

That match history, We were doing so well, 15 game streak bringing him up from B5 - then I lost! I cri errytim.

IGN is same as forum name for me.
No i love you ian! just thought you wanted to go on your higher elo account :P
Where have you been iaaaaan? Hope ur ok :)

are u a girl?

im smurfing ill carry u 

im adc main

That Ian sure is an amazing ADC. 

Just sayin ;)
I know :) I don't really like ADC so it works out well when he's happy to take that role from me! otherwise {{item:3073}} {{item:3073}}

I am from Silver 2, currently dropped to B1 due to placement and trolls
Feel free to add me, I will help you reach silver once you have hit at least Bronze 1.

Based on your match history, you deserve to be in higher rank than your current one

and i was also just playing ranked with friends for awhile who were not all the greatest but i liked playing with them anyways. Nowadays i really just wanna get up in ranks and just learn everything i can and just be proud of my elo :P (added my cousin via FB and he was plat2 ~b4 FTW~ he was prob like wow shes a noob..)
